name: UNDERTALE: Milky Way
description:
**The audio gets really messed up in the WebGL version (especially if you're using Safari). I suggest downloading the standalone if you want better audio (sorry!!!)**

A fan-made Undertale fight starring Toby from Tammy & The Milky Way, created by Parker Napolillo!

I really don't know what to put here uhh have a list of stuff that's in it!!!

  • Four different endings!
  • A new soul color and ability!
  • Lotsa different attacks (wow)
  • Flowey to taunt you and react to your actions!
  • Funny post processing effects!
  • Fun interactive title screen with the music and stuff!
  • (some) original music created by me!
  • Me babbling!
  • Absolutely horrendous extremely inefficient spaghetti code!
  • lancer (very important)

please play it i think you'll probably enjoy it most likely (maybe)
